# **Other Useful Tools**

[**Canadian Pediatric Endocrine Group - Shiny Apps for Anthropometric Calculations**](https://cpeg-gcep.net/content/shiny-apps "CEGP")

-   [*who2007*](https://cpeg-gcep.shinyapps.io/who2007_cpeg/): a *Shiny* app for children ages 5--19 years, based on the [WHO growth *reference*](http://www.who.int/growthref/en/)

-   [Growth chart plotter](https://cpeg-gcep.shinyapps.io/growth219/) for WHO (for children 2--19 years) and US CDC (2--20 years)

-   [Growth chart plotter for WHO](https://cpeg-gcep.shinyapps.io/growth02/) for children 0--2 years

-   [How to create csv files and calculate age in months in excel?](https://cpeg-gcep.net/sites/default/files/plotter/csv.html#2)
